Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-compose is earlier than 2.27.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-44487
